A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful movie. Tarnishes everything that Luke stood for in the OT. Puts stupid one-liner humor made for fair-weather Star Wars fans above good\, coherent story telling and character development. I made a Rotten Tomatoes account purely to write this review. I will be boycotting Solo in hopes that true lovers of the Star Wars universe will follow suit and get Cathleen fired. You should've taken a page out of Marvel's book and actually\, oh\, I don't know\, had a plan for the trilogy? A SERIOUS disappointment. Shame on you Cathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson. May the force be with you\, Carrie <3
